page.title: 10Clubs in Carsington
page.content: Carsington and Hopton Womens Institute was founded forty five years ago and today has twelve members who meet together once a month in each others homes because we have no village hall.At our meetings we invite speakers who give talks on a variety of topics. Thursday Club is run by Mrs Springall in her own home for children aged between 9 and 14.The children play a variety of games and there is also a religious content.Approximately twelve children attend every fortnight. Sunday School (also run by Mrs Springall) takes place once a fortnight and is attended by many children from the village.There is a party every year for the children who attend Sunday School and Thursday Club.
